alert.note: Alert for Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 13 at 5:57PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Victoria County through 630 PM CDT... At 557 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fordtran, or 17 miles north of Victoria, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Victoria, Fordtran and Salem. This includes US Highway 77 between mile markers 560 and 572. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
